result.markdown: --- title: "Week 12: Dynamic regression" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * How to combine regression models with ARIMA models to form dynamic regression models * Dynamic harmonic regression to handle complex seasonality * Lagged predictors ## Pre-class activities Read [Chapter 10 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/dynamic.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 2-6 from [Section 10.7 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/dynamic-exercises.html). ## Monday lecture Download slides [Code used in lecture](seminar_code.R) ## Post-class activities * Do any exercises not yet finished. * Complete past exams: [[2021](/exams/exam_2022.pdf)] [[2022](/exams/exam_2022.pdf)] [[2023](/exams/exam_2023.pdf)] [[2024](/exams/exam_2024.pdf)] * Re-read the textbook * Listen again to all lectures, workshops, tutorials ## Assignments * [Retail Project](../assignments/Project.qmd) is due on Friday 30 May.
